<template>
  <v-card>
    <v-card-title>
      Criar nova tarefa
    </v-card-title>
    <v-card-text>
      <v-text-field
        label="TÃ­tulo da sua tarefa"
        v-model="title"
        :rules="[(v) => Boolean(v) || 'TÃ­tulo Ã© obrigatÃ³rio']"
        @keyup.enter="submit(title)"
      ></v-text-field>
    </v-card-text>
    <v-card-actions>
      <v-btn color="primary" text @click="$emit('close')">
        Fechar
      </v-btn>
      <v-spacer></v-spacer>
      <v-btn color="primary" dark @click="submit(title)">
        Salvar
      </v-btn>
    </v-card-actions>
  </v-card>
</template>
<script>
import { create } from "@/services/taskService";

export default {
  name: "CreateTaskComponent",
  data: () => ({ title: "" }),
  methods: {
    submit(title) {
      if (!title) {
        this.$emit("alert", "Ã‰ necessÃ¡rio inserir um tÃ­tulo.");
        return;
      }
      create(title).then((resp) => {
        console.log(
          "ðŸš€ ~ file: CreateTaskComponent.vue ~ line 30 ~ create ~ resp",
          resp
        );
        this.$emit("close");
      });
    },
  },
};
</script>
